Text:
I was just talking about this movie at a bar, and no-one knew of it.
I was going to find my VHS and revisit it, but now I'll enjoy the movie with out the tracking issues.

Thanks, and a damn shame to lose him, even from those B-grade goatie rolls, after all, he did the best himself, so at least he gave TV movies his spare time ;)

R.I.P Mr Hopper.
You're welcome and enjoy.  I will be updating the NFO of this release shortly! :)
